availability_constraints: Single point of contact for all infrastructure work.

alternative_allocation: Can be pulled into application performance tuning if infrastructure work finishes early.

skill_development_goals: Deepen expertise in event-driven architecture and performance tuning.
risk_mitigation: Pair with mid-level engineer on security-critical IAM features.
alternative_allocation: Can begin architectural design for the next epic (Profile Management) due to low utilization.

risk_mitigation: Requires review from senior engineer on all security-related code.
alternative_allocation: Can take on additional backend tasks from Sprint 3 backlog or focus on improving unit test coverage.

skill_development_goals: Establish frontend architecture and state management patterns.
risk_mitigation: Blocked by backend API availability; needs to work against mocked APIs initially.
alternative_allocation: Can architect and build the shared component library for future sprints.

risk_mitigation: Requires pairing with senior dev on authentication flow implementation.

availability_constraints: Blocked until staging environment is stable (mid-sprint 2).
